name: Winrar Compressing Dump Files
description: Detects a suspicious winrar execution that involves a file with a .dmp extension, which could be a step in a process of dump file exfiltration
false_positives: Legitimate use of WinRAR with a command line in which .dmp appears incidentally
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\rar.exe OR *\\winrar.exe) OR process.pe.description:Command\ line\ RAR) AND process.command_line:*.dmp*)`
